item.description:
We were unable to hold an actual Pow Wow, this year.

In its place, I've posted the reviews of films that we would have discussed at the Pow Wow in order to help everyone make choices.  Those with high ratings from IMDB or Rotten Tomatoes are in bold.

Please check out the Meetup Website for reviews of the films Thursday - Sunday.

Please feel free to add comments with any information about any of the films that may have been shared at the Pow Wow to give members more reason to attend, or avoid, any of the films.

And, please comment on the films you plan to attend, so that we might Meetup and attend together.

See everyone at the Festival!

John
item.how_to_find_us: Please feel free to add a comment to meetup with other members, or to add information for any film
item.name: First Ever Virtual Pow Wow
